REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f9676 reute d f BC-PENTAIR-<PNTA>-OFFERI 03-18 0050

TEXT.TITLE: PENTAIR <PNTA> OFFERING UNDER WAY
TEXT.BODY: Pentair Inc said it began a public offering of two mln shares of 1.50 dlr cumulative preferred stock priced at 25 dlrs per share. Proceeds will be used to repay bank debt incurred to finance the acquisition of McNeil Corp in August 1986. Reuter
